FR12.title: Number of seats per table
FR12.description: The system will support 4 seats per table.

FR13.title: List of entrees
FR13.description:
The system will support the following entrees:

steak
chicken
lobster
pasta
none

FR14.title: Placing an order updates occupied status
FR14.description: Placing an order updates the table's occupied status to true within the table database.

FR15.title: Placing an order updates number in party
FR15.description: Placing an order updates the table's number in party within the table database.

FR16.title: Placing an order updates a seat's order
FR16.description: Placing an order updates the seat's order within the table database.

FR17.title: Placing an order updates check total
FR17.description:
Placing an order increases the table's check total within the table database, by an amount depending on the entree ordered, according to the following schedule:

Entree: Amount

steak: 14.0
chicken: 10.0
lobster: 18.0
pasta: 12.0
none: 0.0

FR18.title: Clearing a table resets occupied status
FR18.description: Clearing a table updates the table's occupied status to false within the table database.

FR19.title: Clearing a table resets number in party
FR19.description: Clearing a table updates the table's number in party to 0 within the table database.

FR20.title: Clearing a table resets orders for all seats
FR20.description: Clearing a table clears the orders for all seats of the table within the table database.

FR21.title: Clearing a table resets check total
FR21.description: Clearing a table updates the table's check total to 0.0 within the table database.

FR22.title: Obtaining check total
FR22.description: The system will provide a way to obtain the check total for a given table.

FR23.title: Size of waiting list
FR23.description: The system will support a waiting list of up to 10 parties.

FR24.title: Adding a party to waiting list
FR24.description: The system will provide a means of adding a party to the waiting list, with the party specified by name.

FR25.title: Getting the head of the waiting list
FR25.description: The system will provide a means of obtaining the name of the party at the head of the waiting list.

FR27.title: Adding free dessert
FR27.description:
Placing certain orders will qualify the seat for free dessert, according to the following schedule:

Steak with caesar salad and a mixed drink qualifies a seat for pie.
Lobster with green salad and wine qualifies a seat for cake.
